name: BuzzChat
description: A messaging web app that allows you to send messages, and images to other users. The account, and messages were securely managed via REST API.

name: EchoBoard
description: A web app that allows you to post secretly among the permitted members. Uses a login authentication, and specific permission structures to handle privacy of posting, and moderate contents submitted.

name: PixelHunt
description: A web app game version of "Where's Waldo" which you need to find certain characters in the picture, and post your highscore anonymously. Implements a REST API to send, receive data, and secure the score points to avoid tampering.
